column5: My son caught his biggest fish ever Saturday afternoon on Colpoys Bay. He picked the rod out of the holder and told my buddy (who is  a less experienced fisherman than my son) that he had a good sized fish on. My buddy said "No you don't." Twice. MY son being an equitable fisherman was going to give Larry the rod, but after Larry told him twice that he didn't have a fish on, he decided to bring it to net by himself .  The look on Larry's face when the fish broke water 50' behind the boat said it all.  The boy was quite proud to show his fish off back at the Wiarton harbor.
Sorry, had trouble taking off phone cam. Poor Larry has better pics on his camera.
If you use photobucket the pic's will be proper size.
NICE!!!  Kid's gonna be braggin' on that one all summer.....and so he should
Love it. Your son will lord that fish over your buddy forever.
Almost make a 300 lb man cry....
Nice !!! That'll teach him to listen next time
Love to see things like that, Priceless Tight Lines SBK
